title.x-prompt: What is the title of the application?

theme.x-prompt: Choose a theme. Please note: Material is advised, Bootstrap is only there for backward compatibility.

font.x-prompt: Choose a font. Please note: Frutiger is mandatory for CI/CD conformity. "none" option will not include any external font, meaning Arial will be used.

langs.x-prompt: Choose the supported languages. Use a whitespace separated list.

ajv.x-prompt: Add schema validation? This enables form validation based on a schema delivered by the server.

unknownRoute.x-prompt: Add the ObUnknownRouteModule? It will display custom 404 pages instead of redirecting to the home page?

httpInterceptors.x-prompt: Add the ObHttpApiInterceptor? It will show a spinner and handles errors on API calls

prefix.x-prompt: Choose a prefix for components and directives's selectors? Leave empty for no prefix)

jest.x-prompt: Replace Karma / Jasmine with Jest as the application's testing framework?

protractor.description: Protractor for end to end tests
protractor.x-prompt: Would you like to keep Protractor for e2e tests? Warning: If not, whole e2e folder will be removed!

npmrc.x-prompt: Is the project located within confederation / federal network? It will add an .npmrc file.

proxy.x-prompt: Choose a port for the proxy configuration for server connection? Leave empty for no proxy configuration.

jenkins.x-prompt: Choose the organization and application names for Cloud Foundry? Leave empty for no Jenkins / CF configuration

static.x-prompt: Use the static build pack for CF?

eslint.x-prompt: Replace deprecated tslint with eslint & prettier?

husky.x-prompt: Add git hooks to automatically format changed files?
